Changelog
=========

0.8 (2014-04-21)
----------------

- save AgentPortrait as contentleadimage for AgentProfilePages


0.7 (2014-04-09)
----------------

- make Agents sortable by a parameter in the user settings (admin view)


0.6 (2014-03-31)
----------------

- adust AgentPortrait scaling to 266x266 (square format)


0.5 (2014-03-30)
----------------

- versioning cleanup


0.4 (2014-03-30)
----------------

- fix agent zope-auth error for Agents


0.3 (2014-03-24)
----------------

- automated Agent Folder Generation & Setup (en/es/de)


0.2 (2014-03-19)
----------------

- add custom user actions (personal bar) to agents folders


0.1 (2014-03-13)
----------------

- Package created using zopeskel
